titleStmt.title: Henry B. Stanwood to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG11501

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.collection: 45th, 47th, 48th, and 49th Regiments Kentucky Infantry Muster Rolls

body.p:
Camp 4th Ky Inf.
Chattanooga Tenn
November 13th 1863.
Gov.

With this I have notified Adjt. Gen. Boyle. of the non acceptance of Commission ats 1st Lieut & Adjt. of the 49th Ky. Inf. which you so kindly assisted me to procure, and deeming it but just, to give you my reasons for so doing is my excuse for now addressing you.

No Commissioned officer being with the Co. but myself. The dissatisfaction that it would create, if I should leave them at this time, and at the solicitation of the Field Officers of the Reg't. I have concluded to stay with the 4th Ky. & while I think it will be for the good of the service to remain here, I would earnestly reccomend Thos P. Young Co "A." 4th Ky, for the promotion, (with whom you are personally acquainted.) He is a young man of good character, and fine capacity for the duties of an Adjt. and I understand our Col. would readily consent to his "Muster out", if he could procure the Commission.

I am Gov. Very Res'ptly, Yr obt svt.
Henry B. Stanwood
2d Lieut Co "B,," 4th Ky Inf.

To.
Hon. Thos E. Bramlette
Gov. of Kentucky

Henry B. Stanwood Adjt com cancelled
1. 2. 3-
Refered to Adjt Genl I recommend the Commission as suggested
Issue to Young -- a com as Adjutant in place of Stanwood declined and forward to 4th Ky. Inf.
2 Lieut Thos P. Young Coy A. 4 Ky Infy com Adjutant 49th Ky Infy Novr 20 1863 vice Philos Stratton promo;

49 Infy
4 Infy
Adj: Young
Com issd & forwd
Novr 20: 1863
